s_synopsis: On the planet Sophia the 3rd, located near the center of the Epsilon Galaxy, an advanced civilization flourishes. In the year 2052 of the space age calendar, the Inbem Dark Star Army, led by the universe's most feared tyrant Goez, invade and conquer Sophia the 3rd. The Science Academy of NORA, a satellite orbiting near Sophia the 3rd that somehow managed to avoid the invasion, built a weapon, an all-purpose tank called the "Metal Attacker", in a last-ditch effort to defeat Goez's army. A young soldier named Kane Gardner is chosen as the pilot of this weapon.
